lead_paragraph: Sprint is eliminating more jobs as it seeks to cut costs after already cutting about 2,500 jobs since last fall, or about 8 percent of its work force.

headline.print_headline: Sprint Lays Off More Workers as It Pursues a Turnaround

snippet: Sprint is eliminating more jobs as it seeks to cut costs after already cutting about 2,500 jobs since last fall, or about 8 percent of its work force.
abstract: Sprint announces plans to eliminate another round of layoffs in effort to continue cutting costs.
